title: Field Remedy: 2272
subject: Wheel bolts - Damages

metadata.complaintGroup:
01 - Broken or Cracked,02 - Chafing,11 -
Loose or Comes off

complaint:
Damages of wheel bolts due to none
compliance of working procedure.

remedyContent.text:
Before mounting the wheels the contact surfaces of the brake discs/
brake drums and the rims have to be cleaned with a steel brush. Both 
contact surfaces have to be free of grease, only around the centering 
it is allowed to slightly grease.

Before each mounting operation of the wheel bolts/nuts the cone has to 
be cleaned up with a clean cloth.

Note:
Wheel bolts which require grease on the cone need to be replaced if 
they have be mounted several times without grease. It has to be taken 
care that no grease is on the bolt thread.
Antara:          Torque = 140 Nm / Cone = no grease
Opel GT:         Torque = 140 Nm / Cone = grease

Agila A:         up to MY 2004 (wheel nuts) 
                 Torgue = 85 Nm / Cone = grease
                 from MY 2004 (wheel bolts) 
                 Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease

Agila B:         (version wheel bolts) 
                 Torque = 85 Nm / Cone = no grease
Vivaro:          Torque = 140 Nm / Cone = no grease

Movano A:        up to 2001.5 MY (15" Wheels, wheel nuts)
                 Torque = 150 Nm / Cone = no grease

Movano A:        from 2001.5 MY (16" Wheels, wheel bolts)
                 Torque = 170 Nm / Cone = no grease

Movano B:        Front Wheel Drive (wheel bolts)
                 Torque = 170 Nm / Cone = no grease

Movano B:        Rear Wheel Drive with Single Rear Wheel (wheel bolts)
                 Torque = 260 Nm / Cone = no grease

Movano B:        Rear Wheel Drive with Twin Rear Wheel (wheel nuts)
                 Torque = 230 Nm / Cone = no grease
Insignia:        Torque = 150 Nm / Cone = no grease
Astra J:         Torque = 140 Nm / Cone = no grease
Astra G:         Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Astra H:         Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Corsa C:         Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Corsa C Combo:   Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Corsa D:         Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Meriva:          Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Meriva B:        Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Signum:          Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Tigra B:         Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Vectra C:        Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Zafira A:        Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease
Zafira B:        Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease

Frontera A:      Torque = 110 Nm / Cone = grease (steel wheels)
                 Torque = 120 Nm / Cone = grease (alloy wheels)
Frontera B:      Torque = 118 Nm / Cone = grease
Campo:           Torque = 118 Nm / Cone = grease
Sintra:          Torque = 140 Nm / Cone = grease

Note: 
For further models or information please refer to TIS2Web information.
